short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cross-browser polyfill for Chrome's window.ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A cross-browser polyfill for Chrome's latest API, "window.ai", for use on browsers without it (old chrome versions, other browsers like Brave, etc).

Allows for usage of sites that use this API (chromeai.co) out of the box with the embedded Gemini Nano model. Future versions will include an option to use a different model, and non-local ones like Groq's models.
